question: 舞台
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>dance</kanji> <kanji>machine</kanji> isn't really a machine... a <ja>台</ja> is a large machine thing counter, so in this case it's talking about a stage. A dancing stage is a <vocabulary>stage</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just remember that <ja>台</ja> is read as <ja>たい</ja> here, not <ja>だい</ja>.
